description: Bad exception is hiding a missing "instance_type_id" field on that attributes list for an Instance. Current resize code expects an instance_type field instead.
title: Instance_type_id refactor broke XS Resizes

comments.content: Bad exception is hiding a missing "instance_type_id" field on that attributes list for an Instance. Current resize code expects an instance_type field instead.
